item.title: Setup
item.description: This document shows a brief guide to setup hugo-theme-monochrome in your hugo project. Quick Start Install Hugo You need “extended” version of hugo to support SASS. Checkout Install Hugo for more details. Take Linux for example: snap install hugo --channel=extended The minimum hugo version that hugo-theme-monochrome required is 0.112.0 Create a New Site hugo new site <project name> Add a Theme cd <project name> git init git submodule add https://github.com/kaiiiz/hugo-theme-monochrome.git themes/hugo-theme-monochrome Then add theme = "hugo-theme-monochrome" to your config.
